subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: Bern Identity, the favorite, overtook Handsome Jack and won the $200,000 Sanford Stakes for 2-year-olds at Saratoga Springs, N.Y.
snippet: Bern Identity, the favorite, overtook Handsome Jack and won the $200,000 Sanford Stakes for 2-year-olds at Saratoga Springs, N.Y.
